article.headline: Morgan St. 81, S. Carolina St. 55
article.story: BALTIMORE (AP)Reggie Holmes scored a game-high 25 points and made seven threes to tie a school record on Monday night as Morgan State downed South Carolina State, 81-55. Holmes shot just 1-of-3 inside the arc, but made 7 of 9 shots from behind the 3-point line. The Bears (15-8, 9-1 Mid-Eastern Athletic Conference) pulled away from South Carolina State (8-16, 4-6) late in the first half, using a 14-4 run over the final 5:19 to take a 43-26 lead into halftime. Jamar Smith scored nine of his 20 points in the first half to go along with five rebounds. Boubacar Coly added a game-high 13 rebounds. The Bulldogs, who trailed by as many as 20 in the second half, climbed to within 58-46 with 11:47 remaining after a three-pointer by Everett Spencer. But Morgan State never let the lead dip under 10 points and the Bears put the game out of reach with 3:59 left when Rogers Barnes completed a three-point play to make the score 76-55. Julius Carter led South Carolina State with 12 points and five rebounds, while Carrio Bennett chipped in 11 points and two assists. Morgan State has won eight in a row, the most since 1974.

statistics.name: points
statistics.description: The number of points scored.

statistics.name: fieldGoals
statistics.description: Field Goal makes and attempts.

statistics.name: freeThrows
statistics.description: Free Throw makes and attempts.

statistics.name: assists
statistics.description: The number of times a player who passes the ball to a teammate in a way that leads to a score by field goal, meaning that he or she was "assisting" in the basket. There is some judgment involved in deciding whether a passer should be credited with an assist.

statistics.name: turnovers
statistics.description: The number of times a player loses possession to the other team.

statistics.name: minutes
statistics.description: The total number of minutes played.

statistics.name: assistTurnoverRatio
statistics.description: The average number of assists a player or team records per turnover

statistics.name: rebounds
statistics.description: The total number of rebounds (offensive and defensive).

statistics.description: The number of times when the defense obtains the possession of the ball after a missed shot by the offense.
